A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie is very good. Anyone disappointed with this movie is just upset because it didn’t meet their expectations of how Rey’s story should have gone\, how the force works\, etc. In other words\, because they have been a long time fan\, they think they own the franchise. God forbid someone do something bold and different. The same fans who hated on The Force Awakens for being too similar to a new hope are now hating on The Last Jedi because it’s different from any other Star Wars movie.
